examples: Hey! How's it going today?
How's it going with your new job?
Long time no see! How's it going?
See you later, take care!
Take care of yourself while you're away.
It was nice meeting you. Take care!
Don't worry, I'm on my way now.
I'm on my way to the office.
Are you coming? Yes, I'm on my way.
I forgot what I was saying. Never mind.
Never mind, I'll do it myself.
Did you say something? No, never mind.
Let's meet at 5 PM. Sounds good!
A pizza for dinner? Sounds good to me.
That plan sounds good, let's do it.
It was great seeing you! Keep in touch.
Let's keep in touch over the summer.
Give me a call sometime, keep in touch!
Hey man, what's up?
What's up with the computer? It's slow.
Not much is up, just relaxing.
I finally passed the exam! Good for you!
I'm starting a new hobby. Good for you.
Good for you for standing up for yourself.
Thanks for the help. No problem!
Sorry I'm late. No problem, come on in.
Can you hold this? No problem.
I'm busy now, I'll get back to you later.
Let me check the schedule and I'll get back to you.
I'll get back to you as soon as I can.
